title: SoC SAI 401-0-21 Topics in Sound Production

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course emphasizes the importance of sound in moving image art through assignments that put its creation and conception first. Students will look at uses of sound across experimental film, video art, and installation work to gain an understanding of the contemporary landscape. Class time will include case studies of specific artists, an introduction to 5.1 mixing, alternative mic'ing techniques and critiques of student work. By the end of this class students will have a stronger sense of the role of sound in art and experimental films and various new recording and mixing techniques to advance their creative expression.
